ref: 10333 *mēll ʻ leave, let go ʼ. [Cf. Ap. mullaï ʻ lets go ʼ (from *mulla -- replacing mutta -- < muktá -- ?)]
Pk. mellaï, millaï, milhaï ʻ abandons ʼ, caus. pp. millāvia -- ;
G. melvũ ʻ to let go, leave, send, place, keep ʼ, melāvvũ ʻ to set free ʼ; -- ext. -- kk -- :
N. milkinu ʻ to be thrown away ʼ, milkāunu ʻ to abandon ʼ.
